mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.excution_code , t1.rule_code , t1.remark , t1.create_user , t1.create_date , t1.update_user , t1.update_date , t1.version_num , t1.new_version_is_update , t1.help , t1.validate_state , t1.parent_code from sys_rule_then_config t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update sys_rule_then_config t1 set t1.excution_code =#{dto.excutionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.rule_code =#{dto.ruleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.remark =#{dto.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.version_num ='1', t1.new_version_is_update ='1', t1.help =#{dto.help,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.update_user =#{dto.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.update_date = sysdate where t1.id = #{dto.id}
delete from sys_rule_then_config t1 where t1.rule_code = ${code}
